justifications: The main subject will be 'continued economic stability and shared economic growth in the United Kingdom, Europe, and globally'
The main subject will be 'continued economic stability and shared economic growth in the United Kingdom, Europe, and globally'
Obama said last week that the Brexit vote raises 'longer-term concerns' about global growth at a time of already weak economic output.
Obama insisted that Brexit would not harm transatlantic unity.
Obama also warned against a bitter divorce that would undermine security in the face of a resurgent Russia.
The Treasury Department said in a statement... Lew will hold talks with counterparts in Paris, London, Brussels and Berlin during the July 11-14 trip.
